com.eurosonic.eurosonicut

Interface IEurosonicUTScan


  • public interface IEurosonicUTScan
    Interface to control scan mode

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setScanMode(short ch, int mode)
      Setup scan behavior
      void startScan(short nbCh)
      Starts scan mode, it runs data acquisition process based on acquisition parameters entered
      void stopScan(short ch)
      Stops scan mode, kill the data acquisition process

    • Method Detail

      • setScanMode

        void setScanMode(short ch,
               int mode)
        Setup scan behavior
        Parameters:
        ch - Channel number of the UT card (unused=0)
        mode - Scan mode 0 : Time mode 1 : Encoder mode

      • startScan

        void startScan(short nbCh)
        Starts scan mode, it runs data acquisition process based on acquisition parameters entered
        Parameters:
        nbCh - Number of Channels to acquire

      • stopScan

        void stopScan(short ch)
        Stops scan mode, kill the data acquisition process
        Parameters:
        ch - Channel number of the UT card (unused=0)
